result.title: Starting competitive
result.content: Hi, this blog contains only short updates on my progress, what problems I am struggling with (programming ones, of course), and what my current learning topic. As my friend suggested, in order to practice implementing algo and DS, search problems with implementation tag, and solve from the most number of AC. I just solved problem 158A for my first AC in CF. I will try to solve one problem daily for beginner. See you in next update!
